cPanel/WHM NYC VPS COMBO - Just $17.00!​
cPanel/WHM - 1.5GB RAM - 70GB HDD - 1250GB BW - 2 IP's!​
$7.00/Mo - Deploy VPS 
Just add cPanel/WHM on Checkout!​
 ​
 ​
Hello Everyone,
Firstly Myself & Tyler would like to thank everyone for the fantastic feedback we received upon our public offers. We've taken the time to tweak our plans a little and also introduce Semi-annual payment terms on some of our micro VPS's We'd also like to note we've made the decision to not ride the massive RAM RACE and cram as much into 1 node as possible. instead we'd like to call it adding a "Value Added Service"  to our VPS's instead of providing the uber cheap "I'll kill my server in under 6 month deals"  which in effect does not sustain a reliable business nor sturdy infrastructure.
 
Anyways let's take a look what's new:
- We'd like to introduce the $10.00/mo cPanel/WHM Licenses on all OpenVZ VPS's (Above 512MB RAM)
- All VPS's are currently self-managed, we provide a cPanel Management Package which includes cPanel/WHM + Server Management for $19.95 a month.
- -Our VPS control panel (SolusVM) is in between having a makeover, more information will follow soon on that and preview.
- We're also testing Proxmox at the moment
 
FREE Customer FTP-- We will be providing a personal FTP backup area where you can store your important files/backups etc. This will consist of 33% of your total VPS Storage. So if you have 15GB Space you will have 5GB FTP Space. --- This will be live around the 12th September.
 
Company Facts:

  • 99.99% Network Uptime Guarantee
  • Knowledgeable & Helpful 24x7 Support
  • Enterprise HP/ Dell Server Hardware
  • Premium Network Providers covering NYC & Europe
  • Simplistic, East to use Control Panel
  • Our Priority is strictly helping YOU & YOUR Business
  • Not happy? 7 Day Money Back Guarantee!
Would you like to find out more about Dedicated Minds? Take a peak: About us
